We require some clarification regarding our setup. We have replaced the 2x1 section on the front of our swerve drive with 1x1 to accommodate an under-the-bumper intake. We are wondering if we can raise one side of the bumpers higher off the ground compared to the rest. This photo shows a mockup of what we are thinking. We appreciate any help that can be provided. If needed, we can provide more photos or information. Thank you in advance.\u003cbr\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"lightbox-wrapper\"\u003e\u003ca class=\"lightbox\"
